SEARCH
Package acsse.csc3a.graph.algorithms

Class MSTFeatures.MSTNormalizer

java.lang.Object
acsse.csc3a.graph.algorithms.MSTFeatures.MSTNormalizer
Enclosing class:
MSTFeatures
public static class MSTFeatures.MSTNormalizer extends Object
This class provides the service of normalization over the entire data set feature vectors are centered around 0 with standard deviation being 1. This allows us to use thresholds on Euclidean distances between normalized MST vectors for pre-filtering in a meaningful way when features have very different ranges
